channel.title: Design on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Design on John Cosio

item.title: Disney Aulani Resort
item.description: Had a quick gig on the Disney Aulani site when I was still at RCG. Mostly worked on the front-end implementation of redesign. Just did the CSS and a little template here and there. So starting from this page until checkout are what I’ve worked on this project. It was straightforward but there were many changes done. Skills: PHP, HTML5, CSS3, Web design

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju
item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju Trying something different with the layouts. Also playing around with changing the Gundam’s color with this one. Before After A quick edit with colors. Changing from red to blue and the guns near the eyes. More practice with glowing things like the gun scopes and eye. Sometime in the future I would like to paint this.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju
item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju Trying something different with the layouts. Also playing around with changing the Gundam’s color with this one. Before After A quick edit with colors. Changing from red to blue and the guns near the eyes. More practice with glowing things like the gun scopes and eye. Sometime in the future I would like to paint this.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam Cross Silhouette Crossbone Gundam X1
item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam Cross Silhouette Crossbone Gundam X1 Hello, here we are again with another GIMP Complete. I finished over during the holidays. Had some problems using my Mother’s laptop. It was just shutting down without warning. Can’t blame the laptop since it’s really old. Stopped running Windows XP and had to reformat with Linux. LXLE made it usable again but that’s a story for another time. Setting up I need to get some base to pose the Gundam in the air.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW
item.description: This is my first take on painting with GIMP. Subject is the Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW version. Practicing adding glowing things to eyes and the scythe. Before After I got some more posts coming up. Cleaning up the Gundam Crossbones and working on the SD Sinanju. Still 2 more SD then moving on to my MG kit or get some HG for practice. This is actually quite relaxing. Haven’t opened Steam in a while.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW
item.description:
So after looking around on how to paint and what best way to do this I ended up coloring and working on this using my computer. This is the previous SD we built – Wing Gundam EW Before editing using GIMP Before editing After editing Cleaned up some nubs, changes colors and a lot more easier done.
Pros of using computer Cheaper I didn’t have to buy any paint Faster, it is seen asap.

item.title: Jenni Epperson
item.description: My first project using WordPress and working with Dart back in September 2013. Developed a WordPress child theme of twentyeleven from an already designed HTML template. Second redesign was around March of 2015. The new theme was a responsive theme with a request to add a survey to get user feedback. The survey is mandatory and needs to be finished first before viewers can access the content. Redesign results shows that it engages more users to access the site especially those that are using mobile devices, better ways to improve the website by taking into account viewer feedback and demographics.

item.title: ITALS
item.description: A portal application to track employee’s hours and activities to productivity data as reports. This project is from Philippine National Bank. I started working on this system as a team leader and project manager after taking up a Spring Framework course. Developed with Spring Framework for the system logic and back-end. jQuery UI for the datepicker and other dynamic elements. Configured a Centos Server as production environment. Skills: Java, JSP, Javascript, JQuery, AJAX, Spring Framework, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL, Project Management, Task delegation to team

item.title: Allied Bank Customer Service Incentive Program
item.description: A portal application to allow employees to vote and nominate colleagues to get awards based on their performance. Continued and finished this Java project. Built with JSP for the view, Java as back-end and PostgreSQL for the database. Delivered the project at least a month before the nomination period and conducted training for administrators and end-users. Skills: Java, JSP, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL Back to Portfolio Want to work with me?

item.title: Virtual Mae
item.description: One of the projects with Dart. This involves lots of customization to themes and especially WooCommerce. The projects is an online shop but for registered members only. Since this is a niche site and shop a customized wish-list was placed to inquire about items. Built using Bootstrap, Parallax, Masonry Galleries and other design requests this is one of the bandwidth-heavy sites I’ve created. Forgot to mention that videos was used as background for home and contact pages.
